title: Helicopter Engine Sounds
description: This is a package of helicopter engine sounds, including 168 high-quality sound effects, 8 kinds of helicopters. Great for creating realistic and futuristic transport with propellers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/helicopter-engine-sounds

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qb4u3p52v0zbzyb/MSE%20-%20Helicopter%20Engine%20Sounds.pdf?dl=0


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 16 fast and 16 slow acceleration sounds
  • 16 fast and 16 slow deceleration sounds
  • 40 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 64 transition sounds between speeds


A total of 8 helicopters in the set. Realistic vehicle samples were used in the creation of this package.Â 


Perfect for creating realistic helicopters, and can also be used to create sci-fi transport with propellers, such as futuristic helicopters, deeticopters, large drones, spacecrafts, spaceships and others. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 168 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 8 helicopters in total
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, mid, high, very high
  • 40 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total
  • 32 acceleration sounds, 32 deceleration sounds
  • 64 transition sounds between engine rpm
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and more


Number of Audio Waves: 168

Number of Audio Cues: 168

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 25 minutes 04 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
